    • Method Detail

      • parseSearch

        public java.util.List<DicomAttributes> parseSearch(org.elasticsearch.search.SearchHits hits,
                                          javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
                                            throws com.pixelmed.dicom.DicomException
        parseSearch is the method which will parse the SearchHits returned as Response from ElasticSearch and build the List of Dicom Attributes Object. This method will also download the dcm file for the given Primary Key from a Search hit and convert to Jpeg.
        Parameters:
        SearchHits - hits, ServletContext context.
        Returns:
        List
        Throws:
        DicomException.
        com.pixelmed.dicom.DicomException
        See Also:
        DicomException

      • buildBoolQuery

        public org.elasticsearch.index.query.BoolQueryBuilder buildBoolQuery(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> qp,
                                                            org.json.JSONObject jobject)
        This method builds the Elasticsearch BoolQuery dynamically. The input to this method should be a map of Query Parameters and their values and the JSON representation of the Query String An Example Query String - {"PatientName": { "Term": "Adam" }, "Age": { "Range": { "gte": "10", "lte": "20" }}, "StudyDescription": {"Match": "Human"},"Modality": {"Term": "CT"}}
        Parameters:
        Map - of Query Parameters
        Returns:
        void
